News.Title: Eastern Silk Industries Appoints Nitin Dubey as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
News.Summary: Eastern Silk Industries Limited's Board of Directors approved the appointment of Mr. Nitin Dubey as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer effective December 4, 2025. Dubey is an Associate Member of the Institute of Company Secretaries of India with experience in Companies Act, Listing Regulations and allied laws.

News.Title: Eastern Silk Industries Company Secretary Ravi Kumar Resigns
News.Summary: Eastern Silk Industries Limited announced the resignation of Mr. Ravi Kumar from his position as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer. His resignation became effective from the close of business hours on November 10, 2025. Kumar cited personal reasons for his departure and expressed gratitude to the Board of Directors for their support during his tenure. The company has informed the stock exchanges about this key managerial personnel change. Kumar holds no shareholding in the company.
